title: SAT Tutoring
description: We host preparation courses on the SAT Exam for students in Ethiopia during the Spring and Summer.

title: Demystifying the College Application
description: The College Application process is a daunting journey. Our instructors help guide you through the ins and outs of navigating this road.

title: Mentorship
description: We pair you up with college students currently attending some of the most prestigious universities in the US. As they share their experiences with you listen to their success stories and learn from their mistakes.
